pkgmetadata.longdescription: Isolate-Detect Methodology for Multiple Change-Point Detection // Provides efficient implementation of the Isolate-Detect methodology for the consistent estimation of the number and location of multiple change-points in one-dimensional data sequences from the "deterministic + noise" model. For details on the Isolate-Detect methodology, please see Anastasiou and Fryzlewicz (2018) https://docs.wixstatic.com/ugd/24cdcc_6a0866c 574654163b8255e272bc0001b.pdf. Currently implemented scenarios are: piecewise-constant signal with Gaussian noise, piecewise- constant signal with heavy-tailed noise, continuous piecewise- linear signal with Gaussian noise, continuous piecewise-linear signal with heavy-tailed noise.
